Line43.6DE47: Don’t you know? A book, a scroll, or anything that will help us cross the Black Lake.
Line17.6DE47: Of course, we can’t let anything stop our pursuit of Lilith. I’ll open the door, and if we split up, we’ll work faster that way.
Line23.BAE4: Only if you stay on this side of the door.
Line15.6DE47: It’s the same seal as before. Should be easy enough to break it again, but why would someone use it here?
